name: Confused Knight
description:
* Please click on 2D scenes (I think)* 

This game is currently troll based and can be quite confusing , also there is only three levels. 

You "can" get 11 items that are scattered around the map but they aren't mandatory. 

Solo project

Controls: Movement is W,A,S,D  and Mouse left click

Biggest Helper to my project goes to Miss. Agnes.

Assets used: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/nature-pixel-art-base-asse...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/hero-knight-pixel-art-165188

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/pixel-art-icon-pack-rpg-15834...
